metadata.author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
metadata.comments: Solution template for Trend Micro Apex One

metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

parserObject1._parserId1: [resourceId('Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/savedSearches', parameters('workspace'), 'Trend Micro Apex One Data Parser')]

properties.description: TMApexOneEvent Data Parser with template version 3.0.3

properties.displayName: Trend Micro Apex One Data Parser
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Trend Micro"
| where DeviceProduct == "Apex Central"
| extend DeviceCustomNumber1 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber1", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber1),
         DeviceCustomNumber2 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber2", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber2),
         DeviceCustomNumber3 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber3", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber3),
         ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID))
| extend packed = pack (DeviceCustomNumber1Label, DeviceCustomNumber1,
    DeviceCustomNumber2Label, DeviceCustomNumber2,
    DeviceCustomString1Label, DeviceCustomString1,
    DeviceCustomString2Label, DeviceCustomString2,
    DeviceCustomString3Label, DeviceCustomString3,
    DeviceCustomString4Label, DeviceCustomString4,
    DeviceCustomString5Label, DeviceCustomString5,
    DeviceCustomString6Label, DeviceCustomString6,
    DeviceCustomDate1Label, DeviceCustomDate1,
    DeviceCustomDate2Label, DeviceCustomDate2)
| evaluate bag_unpack(packed)
| project-rename EventVendor=DeviceVendor,
    EventProduct=DeviceProduct,
    EventProductVersion=DeviceVersion,
    EventSubType=DeviceEventClassID,
    EventMessage=Activity,
    EventSeverity=LogSeverity,
    EventOriginalUid=DeviceExternalID,
    EventEndTime=ReceiptTime,
    DstDvcHostname=DestinationHostName,
    DstIpAddr=DestinationIP,
    DstUserName=DestinationUserName,
    DstPortNumber=DestinationPort,
    DstServiceName=DestinationServiceName,
    SrcPortNumber=SourcePort,
    SrcIpAddr=SourceIP,
    SrcDvcHostname=SourceHostName,
    SrcServiceName=SourceServiceName,
    SrcUserName=SourceUserName,
    SrcProcessName=SourceProcessName,
    SrcMacAddr=SourceMACAddress,
    DvcAction=DeviceAction,
    DvcHostname=DeviceName,
    DvcProcessName=ProcessName,
    FileHashSha1=FileHash,
    UrlOriginal=RequestURL,
    NetworkDirection=CommunicationDirection
| extend Command = iif(DeviceCustomString3Label == "Command", DeviceCustomString3, "")
| extend ActionResult = iif(DeviceCustomString5Label == "ActionResult", DeviceCustomString5, "")
| extend Event_Type = iif(DeviceCustomNumber2Label == "Event_Type", DeviceCustomNumber2, long(null))
| extend VirusName = iif(DeviceCustomString1Label == "VirusName", DeviceCustomString1, "")
| extend Policy = iif(DeviceCustomString2Label == "Policy", DeviceCustomString2, "")
| extend ProcessCommandLine = iif(DeviceCustomString4Label == "ProcessCommandLine", DeviceCustomString4, "")
| project-away DeviceCustomNumber1Label,
    DeviceCustomNumber1,
    DeviceCustomNumber2Label,
    DeviceCustomNumber2,
    DeviceCustomString1Label,
    DeviceCustomString1,
    DeviceCustomString2Label,
    DeviceCustomString2,
    DeviceCustomString3Label,
    DeviceCustomString3,
    DeviceCustomString4Label,
    DeviceCustomString4,
    DeviceCustomString5Label,
    DeviceCustomString5,
    DeviceCustomString6Label,
    DeviceCustomString6,
    DeviceCustomDate1Label,
    DeviceCustomDate1,
    DeviceCustomDate2Label,
    DeviceCustomDate2

properties.parentId: [resourceId('Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/savedSearches', parameters('workspace'), 'Trend Micro Apex One Data Parser')]

properties.displayName: Trend Micro Apex One Data Parser
Trend Micro Apex One Data Parser
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Trend Micro"
| where DeviceProduct == "Apex Central"
| extend DeviceCustomNumber1 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber1", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber1),
         DeviceCustomNumber2 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber2", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber2),
         DeviceCustomNumber3 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber3", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber3),
         ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID))
| extend packed = pack (DeviceCustomNumber1Label, DeviceCustomNumber1,
    DeviceCustomNumber2Label, DeviceCustomNumber2,
    DeviceCustomString1Label, DeviceCustomString1,
    DeviceCustomString2Label, DeviceCustomString2,
    DeviceCustomString3Label, DeviceCustomString3,
    DeviceCustomString4Label, DeviceCustomString4,
    DeviceCustomString5Label, DeviceCustomString5,
    DeviceCustomString6Label, DeviceCustomString6,
    DeviceCustomDate1Label, DeviceCustomDate1,
    DeviceCustomDate2Label, DeviceCustomDate2)
| evaluate bag_unpack(packed)
| project-rename EventVendor=DeviceVendor,
    EventProduct=DeviceProduct,
    EventProductVersion=DeviceVersion,
    EventSubType=DeviceEventClassID,
    EventMessage=Activity,
    EventSeverity=LogSeverity,
    EventOriginalUid=DeviceExternalID,
    EventEndTime=ReceiptTime,
    DstDvcHostname=DestinationHostName,
    DstIpAddr=DestinationIP,
    DstUserName=DestinationUserName,
    DstPortNumber=DestinationPort,
    DstServiceName=DestinationServiceName,
    SrcPortNumber=SourcePort,
    SrcIpAddr=SourceIP,
    SrcDvcHostname=SourceHostName,
    SrcServiceName=SourceServiceName,
    SrcUserName=SourceUserName,
    SrcProcessName=SourceProcessName,
    SrcMacAddr=SourceMACAddress,
    DvcAction=DeviceAction,
    DvcHostname=DeviceName,
    DvcProcessName=ProcessName,
    FileHashSha1=FileHash,
    UrlOriginal=RequestURL,
    NetworkDirection=CommunicationDirection
| extend Command = iif(DeviceCustomString3Label == "Command", DeviceCustomString3, "")
| extend ActionResult = iif(DeviceCustomString5Label == "ActionResult", DeviceCustomString5, "")
| extend Event_Type = iif(DeviceCustomNumber2Label == "Event_Type", DeviceCustomNumber2, long(null))
| extend VirusName = iif(DeviceCustomString1Label == "VirusName", DeviceCustomString1, "")
| extend Policy = iif(DeviceCustomString2Label == "Policy", DeviceCustomString2, "")
| extend ProcessCommandLine = iif(DeviceCustomString4Label == "ProcessCommandLine", DeviceCustomString4, "")
| project-away DeviceCustomNumber1Label,
    DeviceCustomNumber1,
    DeviceCustomNumber2Label,
    DeviceCustomNumber2,
    DeviceCustomString1Label,
    DeviceCustomString1,
    DeviceCustomString2Label,
    DeviceCustomString2,
    DeviceCustomString3Label,
    DeviceCustomString3,
    DeviceCustomString4Label,
    DeviceCustomString4,
    DeviceCustomString5Label,
    DeviceCustomString5,
    DeviceCustomString6Label,
    DeviceCustomString6,
    DeviceCustomDate1Label,
    DeviceCustomDate1,
    DeviceCustomDate2Label,
    DeviceCustomDate2

properties.parentId: [resourceId('Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/savedSearches', parameters('workspace'), 'Trend Micro Apex One Data Parser')]

 | extend EventType = case(
  EventMessage == "7", "Web Security",

  EventMessage == "Suspicious Files", "Suspicious Files",
  "unknown")
  | summarize count() by EventType","size":3,"timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"showBorder":false,"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"EventType","formatter":1},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"count_","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"maximumSignificantDigits":3,"maximumFractionDigits":2}}}}},"name":"query - 9"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"  TMApexOneEvent

| where EventMessage has "CnC Callback" 
| project EventEndTime, SrcIpAddr,  DstIpAddr
","size":0,"title":"CnC connections","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"filter":true}},"customWidth":"35","name":"query - 15","styleSettings":{"maxWidth":"35"}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"TMApexOneEvent

  | where EventMessage has "Data Loss Prevention"

properties.description: @{workbookKey=TrendMicroApexOneWorkbook; logoFileName=trendmicro_logo.svg; description=Sets the time name for analysis.; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=Trend Micro Apex One; templateRelativePath=TrendMicroApexOne.json; subtitle=; provider=TrendMicro}.description
TMApexOneAttackDiscoveryDetectionRisks_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.3
Detects Attack Discovery Detection events.
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventMessage has "Attack Discovery Detection"
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr, AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Analytics Rule 1
TMApexOneCommandLineSuspiciousRequests_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.3
Detects suspicious commandline arguments.
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventMessage has "Endpoint Application"
| where Command has_any ("whoami", "dpkg", "useradd", "sudo")
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr, AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Analytics Rule 2
TMApexOneCommandsInRequest_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.3
Detects commands in Url.
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventSubType in ("WB:7", "CnC:Block", "VAD", "700106") 
| where UrlOriginal contains 'cat%20/etc/passwd' or UrlOriginal contains '/etc/passwd' or UrlOriginal contains 'ping -i' or UrlOriginal contains '/usr/bin/id(' or UrlOriginal contains '%2f%75%73%72%2f%62%69%6e%2f%69%64' or UrlOriginal contains 'phpinfo()' or UrlOriginal contains '%70%68%70%69%6e%66%6f%28%29' or UrlOriginal contains ';id' or UrlOriginal contains '%3b%69%64' or UrlOriginal contains '/bin/bash -c' or UrlOriginal contains '%2f%62%69%6e%2f%62%61%73%68%20%2d%63%27' or UrlOriginal contains '/bin/bash' or UrlOriginal contains '%2f%62%69%6e%2f%62%61%73%68' or UrlOriginal contains 'sleep(' or UrlOriginal contains '%73%6c%65%65%70%28' or UrlOriginal contains 'curl' or UrlOriginal contains '%63%75%72%6c' or UrlOriginal contains '&dir' or UrlOriginal contains '%26%64%69%72' or UrlOriginal contains '& dir' or UrlOriginal =~ '%26%20%64%69%72' or UrlOriginal contains '<script>' or UrlOriginal  contains '%3c%73%63%72%69%70%74%3e' or UrlOriginal contains 'eval(' or UrlOriginal contains '%65%76%61%6c%28' or UrlOriginal contains 'exec(' or UrlOriginal contains '%65%78%65%63%28' or UrlOriginal contains 'whoami' or UrlOriginal contains '%77%68%6f%61%6d%69' or UrlOriginal contains 'wget' or UrlOriginal contains 'python' or UrlOriginal contains 'gcc' or UrlOriginal contains 'uname' or UrlOriginal contains 'systeminfo' or UrlOriginal contains '%77%67%65%74' or UrlOriginal contains '%70%79%74%68%6f%6e' or UrlOriginal contains '%75%6e%61%6d%65' or UrlOriginal =~ '%73%79%73%74%65%6d%69%6e%66%6f' 
| extend UrlCustomEntity = UrlOriginal

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Analytics Rule 3
TMApexOneDvcAccessPermissionWasChanged_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.3
Query shows device access permissions was changed.
properties.displayName: ApexOne - Device access permissions was changed
properties.query:
let threshold = 1;
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventMessage has "Device access"
| extend DeviceCustomNumber3 = coalesce(
                                  column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber3", long(null)),
                                  DeviceCustomNumber3,
                                  long(null)
                              )
| extend Permission = case(
                            DeviceCustomNumber3 == "0", "Modify", 
                            DeviceCustomNumber3 == "1", "Read and execute",
                            DeviceCustomNumber3 == "2", "Read",
                            DeviceCustomNumber3 == "3", "List device content only", 
                            DeviceCustomNumber3 == "4", "Block",
                            "unknown"
                      )
| summarize Permissions = make_set(Permission) by DstUserName
| extend PermissionCount = array_length(Permissions)
| where PermissionCount > threshold
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Analytics Rule 4

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Device access permissions was changed

properties.description: TMApexOneInboundRemoteAccess_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.3
Detects inbound remote access connection.
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventSubType has "WB"
| where NetworkDirection == 1
| where ApplicationProtocol in ('15', '17', '20', '22', '23', '27', '36', '37')
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr, AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Analytics Rule 5
TMApexOneMultipleDenyOrTerminateActionOnSingleIp_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.3
Detects multiple deny or terminate actions on single IP.
properties.displayName: ApexOne - Multiple deny or terminate actions on single IP
properties.query:
let threshold = 5;
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventMessage has "Behavior Monitoring"
| where DvcAction == 2 or DvcAction == 3
| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr, bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)
| where count_ > threshold
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Analytics Rule 6

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Multiple deny or terminate actions on single IP

properties.description: TMApexOnePossibleExploitOrExecuteOperation_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.3
Detects possible exploit or execute operation.
properties.displayName: ApexOne - Possible exploit or execute operation
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventMessage has "Behavior Monitoring"
| extend DeviceCustomNumber3 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber3", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber3)
| where Event_Type == 2048 or DeviceCustomNumber3 == 403 or DeviceCustomNumber3 == 601
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr, AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Analytics Rule 7

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Possible exploit or execute operation

properties.description: TMApexOneRiskCnCEvents_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.3
Detects C&C callback events.
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventMessage has "CnC Callback"
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr, AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Analytics Rule 8
TMApexOneSpywareWithFailedResponse_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.3
Detects spyware with failed response.
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventMessage has "Spyware Detected"
| where ActionResult has_any ("No action", "Unable to")
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr, AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Analytics Rule 9
TMApexOneSuspiciousConnections_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.3
Detects suspicious connections.
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventMessage has "Suspicious Connection"
| where NetworkDirection == 1 
| where DvcAction in ('1', '3')
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr, AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Analytics Rule 10
TMApexOneBehaviorMonitoringTranslatedAction_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.3

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Behavior monitoring actions by files
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventMessage has "Behavior Monitoring"
| where isnotempty(DvcAction)
| extend TranslatedAction = case(
DvcAction == "0", "Allow", 
DvcAction == "1", "Ask",
DvcAction == "2", "Deny",
DvcAction == "3", "Terminate", 
DvcAction == "4", "Read Only",
DvcAction == "5", "Read/Write Only",
DvcAction == "6", "Read/Execute Only", 
DvcAction == "7", "Feedback",
DvcAction == "8", "Clean",
DvcAction == "1002", "Unknown", 
DvcAction == "1003", "Assess",
DvcAction == "1004", "Terminated. Files were recovered.",
DvcAction == "1005", "Terminated. Some files were not recovered.", 
DvcAction == "1006", "Terminated. Files were not recovered.",
DvcAction == "1007", "Terminated. Restart result: Files were recovered.",
DvcAction == "1008", "Terminated: Restart result: Some files were not recovered.", 
DvcAction == "1009", "Terminated: Restart result: Riles were not recovered.",
"unknown")
| summarize ActionByFiles = count() by TranslatedAction, FileName
| top 20 by ActionByFiles asc
| extend FileCustomEntity = FileName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Shows behavior monitoring actions taken for files.

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Hunting Query 1

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Behavior monitoring actions by files

properties.description: TMApexOneBehaviorMonitoringTranslatedOperation_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.3

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Behavior monitoring operations by users
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventMessage has "Behavior Monitoring"
| extend DeviceCustomNumber3 = coalesce(
                                  column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber3", long(null)),
                                  DeviceCustomNumber3,
                                  long(null)
                              )
| where isnotempty(DeviceCustomNumber3)
| extend Translatedoperation = case(
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "101", "Create Process", 
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "102", "Open",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "103", "Terminate",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "104", "Terminate", 
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "301", "Delete",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "302", "Write",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "303", "Access", 
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "401", "Create File",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "402", "Close",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "403", "Execute", 
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "501", "Invoke",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "601", "Exploit",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "9999", "Unhandled Operation",
"unknown")
| summarize OperationCount = count() by Translatedoperation, DstUserName
| sort by OperationCount desc 
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Shows behavior monitoring operations by users.

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Hunting Query 2

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Behavior monitoring operations by users

properties.description: TMApexOneBehaviorMonitoringTriggeredPolicy_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.3

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Behavior monitoring triggered policy by command line
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventMessage has "Behavior Monitoring"
| where isnotempty(Policy)
| extend TriggeredPolicy = case(
Policy == "0", "Compromised executable file", 
Policy == "1", "New startup program",
Policy == "2", "Host file modification",
Policy == "3", "Program library injection", 
Policy == "4", "New Internet Explorer plugin",
Policy == "5", "Internet Explorer setting modification",
Policy == "6", "Shell modification", 
Policy == "7", "New service",
Policy == "8", "Security policy modification",
Policy == "9", "Firewall policy modification", 
Policy == "10", "System file modification",
Policy == "11", "Duplicated system file",
Policy == "13", "Layered service provider", 
Policy == "14", "System process modification",
Policy == "16", "Suspicious behavior",
Policy == "100", "Newly encountered programs", 
Policy == "200", "Unauthorized file encryption",
Policy == "1000", "Threat behavior analysis",
Policy == "9999", "User-defined policy",
"unknown")
| summarize PolicyCount = count() by TriggeredPolicy, ProcessCommandLine
| extend ProcessCustomEntity = ProcessCommandLine

tags.name: description
tags.value: Shows behavior monitoring triggered policy by command line.

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Hunting Query 3

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Behavior monitoring triggered policy by command line

properties.description: TMApexOneBehaviorMonitoringTypesOfEvent_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.3

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Behavior monitoring event types by users
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventMessage has "Behavior Monitoring"
| where isnotempty(Event_Type)
| extend TypeOfEvent= case(
Event_Type == "1", "Process",
Event_Type == "2", "Process image",
Event_Type == "4", "Registry",
Event_Type == "8", "File system",
Event_Type == "16", "Driver",
Event_Type == "32", "SDT", 
Event_Type == "64", "System API",
Event_Type == "128", "User Mode",
Event_Type == "2048", "Exploit",
Event_Type == "65535", "All",
"unknown")
| summarize EventTypeCount = count() by TypeOfEvent, DstUserName
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Hunting Query 4

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Behavior monitoring event types by users

properties.description: TMApexOneChannelType_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.3

properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventMessage has "Data Loss Prevention"
| extend DeviceCustomNumber3 = coalesce(
                                  column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber3", long(null)),
                                  DeviceCustomNumber3,
                                  long(null)
                              )
| where isnotempty(DeviceCustomNumber3)
| extend DlpAction = case(
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "65535", "Not available",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "0", "Removable storage", 
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "1", "SMB",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "2", "Email",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "3", "IM", 
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "4", "FTP",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "5", "HTTP",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "6", "HTTPS", 
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "7", "PGP",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "8", "Data recorders",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "9", "Printer", 
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "10", "Clipboard",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "11", "Sync",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "12", "P2P",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "13", "Webmail", 
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "14", "Document management",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "15", "Cloud storage",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "121", "SMTP email",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "122", "Exchange Client Mail", 
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "123", "Lotus Note Email",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "130", "Webmail (Yahoo! Mail)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "131", "Webmail (Hotmail)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "132", "Webmail (Gmail)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "133", "Webmail (AOL Mail)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "140", "IM (MSN)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "141", "IM (AIM)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "142", "IM (Yahoo Messenger)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "143", "IM (Skype)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "191", "P2P (BitTorrent)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "192", "P2P (EMule)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "193", "P2P (Winny)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "194", "P2P (HTCSYN)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "195", "P2P (iTunes)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "196", "Cloud storage (DropBox)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "197", "Cloud storage (Box)",

DeviceCustomNumber3 == "199", "Cloud storage (OneDrive)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "200", "Cloud storage (SugarSync)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "201", "Cloud storage (Hightail)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "202", "IM (QQ)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "203", "Webmail (other)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "204", "Cloud storage (Evernote)",
DeviceCustomNumber3 == "211", "Document management (SharePoint)",
"unknown")
| summarize ChannelType = count() by DlpAction, DstUserName
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Hunting Query 5
TMApexOneDataLossPreventionAction_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.3

properties.displayName: ApexOne - Data loss prevention action by IP
properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventMessage has "Data Loss Prevention"
| extend DlpAction = case(
DvcAction == "-1", "Not available",
DvcAction == "0", "Blocked", 
DvcAction == "1", "Deleted",
DvcAction == "2", "Delivered",
DvcAction == "3", "Logged", 
DvcAction == "4", "Passed",
DvcAction == "5", "Quarantined",
DvcAction == "6", "Replaced", 
DvcAction == "7", "Archived",
DvcAction == "8", "Archived (message body only)",
DvcAction == "9", "Quarantined (message body only)", 
DvcAction == "10", "Passed (message body only)",
DvcAction == "11", "Encrypted",
DvcAction == "12", "Alerted (endpoint)",
DvcAction == "13", "Alerted (server)", 
DvcAction == "14", "Data recorded",
DvcAction == "15", "User justified",
DvcAction == "16", "Handed off",
DvcAction == "17", "Recipient altered", 
DvcAction == "18", "Blind carbon copied",
DvcAction == "19", "Delivery postponed",
DvcAction == "20", "Stamped",
DvcAction == "21", "Attachment deleted",
DvcAction == "22", "Subject tagged",
DvcAction == "23", "X-header tagged",
DvcAction == "24", "Decrypted",
DvcAction == "25", "Re-encrypted",
DvcAction == "26", "Tagged (mail)",
DvcAction == "27", "Encrypted (user key)",
DvcAction == "28", "Encrypted (group key)",
DvcAction == "29", "Moved",
DvcAction == "30", "Passed (encrypted)",
DvcAction == "31", "Passed (user justified)",
DvcAction == "32", "Blocked (Endpoint Encryption not installed)",
DvcAction == "33", "Blocked (user justified)",
DvcAction == "34", "Blocked (Endpoint Encryption logged off)",
DvcAction == "35", "Blocked (Endpoint Encryption error)",
DvcAction == "36", "web upload",
"unknown")
| summarize ActionCount = count() by DlpAction, SrcIpAddr, FileName
| sort by ActionCount desc 
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr, FileCustomEntity = FileName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Shows data loss prevention action by IP address.

properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(ApplicationProtocol)
| extend AppProtocol = case(
ApplicationProtocol == "0", "Unknown", 
ApplicationProtocol == "1", "SMTP",
ApplicationProtocol == "2", "POP3",
ApplicationProtocol == "3", "IRC",

ApplicationProtocol == "51", "RTSP/RDT-TCP",

ApplicationProtocol == "68", "DNS Request",

ApplicationProtocol == "275", "OpenAP",
ApplicationProtocol == "276", "Kuro",
ApplicationProtocol == "277", "Imesh", 
ApplicationProtocol == "278", "Skype",
ApplicationProtocol == "279", "Google Talk",
ApplicationProtocol == "317", "Cabos", 
ApplicationProtocol == "318", "Zultrax",
ApplicationProtocol == "319", "Foxy",
ApplicationProtocol == "320", "eDonkey",
ApplicationProtocol == "321", "Ares", 
ApplicationProtocol == "322", "Miranda",
ApplicationProtocol == "323", "Kceasy",
ApplicationProtocol == "324", "MoodAmp",
ApplicationProtocol == "325", "Deepnet Explorer", 
ApplicationProtocol == "326", "FreeWire",

properties.description: TMApexOneSpywareDetection_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.3

properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventMessage has "Spyware"
| extend MalwareCustomEntity = VirusName, FileCustomEntity = FileName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Hunting Query 8
TMApexOneSuspiciousFiles_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.3

properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventMessage has "Suspicious File"
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName, FileCustomEntity = FileName

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Hunting Query 9
TMApexOneTopSources_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.3

properties.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| summarize IpCount = count() by SrcIpAddr
| top 20 by IpCount desc 
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query shows list of top sources with alerts.

properties.description: Trend Micro Apex One Hunting Query 10

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

• Review the solution Release Notes

• There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Trend Micro Apex One solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables ingestion of Trend Micro Apex One events into Microsoft Sentinel. Refer to Trend Micro Apex Central for more information.

This solution is dependent on the Common Event Format solution containing the CEF via AMA connector to collect the logs. The CEF solution will be installed as part of this solution installation.

NOTE: Microsoft recommends installation of CEF via AMA Connector. The existing connectors are about to be deprecated by Aug 31, 2024.

Parsers: 1, Workbooks: 1, Analytic Rules: 10, Hunting Queries: 10

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
